channel.title: CVE Feed for Kajitori Co.,Ltd -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kajitori Co.,Ltd -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-46897|2024-10-18T16:32:55.609Z -- kajitori%20co.%2Cltd -- exment
item.description: Incorrect permission assignment for critical resource issue exists in Exment v6.1.4 and earlier and Exment v5.0.11 and earlier. A logged-in user with the permission of table management may obtain and/or alter the information of the unauthorized table.

item.title: CVE-2024-47793|2024-10-18T16:32:09.295Z -- kajitori%20co.%2Cltd -- exment
item.description: Stored cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in Exment v6.1.4 and earlier and Exment v5.0.11 and earlier. When accessing the edit screen containing custom columns (column type: images or files), an arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user.

item.title: CVE-2024-47793|2024-10-18T06:05:11.833Z -- kajitori%20co.%2Cltd -- exment
item.description: Stored cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in Exment v6.1.4 and earlier and Exment v5.0.11 and earlier. When accessing the edit screen containing custom columns (column type: images or files), an arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user.

item.title: CVE-2024-46897|2024-10-18T06:03:40.573Z -- kajitori%20co.%2Cltd -- exment
item.description: Incorrect permission assignment for critical resource issue exists in Exment v6.1.4 and earlier and Exment v5.0.11 and earlier. A logged-in user with the permission of table management may obtain and/or alter the information of the unauthorized table.
